title: Casual Team looking for more!
body:
Hi there have a few casual friends looking to break into the ranked scene, in saying this we would like to add 1-2 more, casual yet active people! 
really interested in team development, we have a few really flexible players that can play any role comfortably, so drop me a line in game and we can hook you up with a discord invite and always happy for fun normals etc!
IGN: Obliviscaris
or hit up Officer: IGN: TrueAlpha

replies.body: I'm keen, I'm looking to join a casual team of like 7-8 people to play few games a week. That way we always have enough for a 5 man game, but flexible enough we don't have to commit every night. I'm S3 main Supp but happy to play any role.
I'm keen if you need more
I'm interested in joining you guys if there is still a spot available.

> Casual Team looking for more!

Looks like a dodgy advertisement.

Would be interested, though.
haha not dodgy, 100% casual, just looking to try a 5 man run's
Ended up adding both usernames, to my friends list.
